wikipedia_page.main: Sir Andrew Barkworth Wright KCMG CBE MC with Bar (30 November 1895 – 24 March 1971) was a British colonial administrator and army officer. He served as the Governor of British Cyprus from 1949 to 1954, and as Governor of the Gambia from 1947 to 1949.

link_mentions.page: List of colonial governors of the Gambia

response: | || Sir Andrew Barkworth Wright became governor.
